message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.IR, cs.NE, cs.SI 

The paper proposes a new approach for time-series classification using a combination of recurrence plots and bag-of-features model. This involves transforming time-series into 2D texture images and applying the BoF model on them. This approach involves techniques from machine learning (cs.LG), computer vision (cs.CV), information retrieval (cs.IR), neural networks (cs.NE), and signal processing (cs.SI). Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG and cs.CV, followed by cs.IR, cs.NE, and cs.SI.
